name: Hytale
author: Raptor Panel
description: Set out on an adventure built for both creation and play. Hytale blends the freedom of a sandbox with the momentum of an RPG: explore a procedurally generated world full of dungeons, secrets, and a variety of creatures, then shape it block by block.
installScript:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

cd /home/container

echo "Downloading Hytale Downloader CLI..."

DOWNLOAD_URL="https://downloader.hytale.com/hytale-downloader.zip"

rm -f hytale-downloader.zip
curl -o hytale-downloader.zip $DOWNLOAD_URL
unzip -o hytale-downloader.zip -d hytale-downloader
mv hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux-amd64 hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux
chmod 555 hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux

echo "Verifying Hytale Downloader installation..."
echo "Hytale Downloader version: $(./hytale-downloader/hytale-downloader-linux -version)"

echo "Hytale Downloader installed successfully."

variables.name: Server Memory
variables.description: The maximum amount of memory (MB) the server can use.

variables.name: Accept Early Plugins
variables.description: Hytale warns that loading early plugins is unsupported and may cause stability issues.

variables.name: Patchline
variables.description: The branch of Hytale to install (release or pre-release).

variables.name: Disable Sentry
variables.description: Hytale uses Sentry to track crashes. Disable Sentry during active plugin development.

variables.name: Use Ahead-of-Time Cache
variables.description: Hytale provides a pre-trained AOT Java cache which can significantly improve boot times.

variables.name: Allow OP Flag
variables.description: Internal flag for --allow-op parameter. Set to '--allow-op' to enable, empty to disable.
